attributes.review: This app is just terrible when I opened it up it had a Oompa Loompa looking man staring at me he also seemed to be wearing foundation in the shade Cheeto. I as part of Gen Z refuse to see this disgusting thing. I came here to say that I am very disappointed with the advertisement of this monstrosity. I now need therapy to unsee what I saw. Would not recommend using this app. To elaborate on my experience more when I downloaded this app weird things started happening like everything was disappearing and my phone had a orange haze and every app I opened had trump 2020 campaigns and advertisements. I quickly realized it MUST be my phone so I went and got a new phone and redone loaded the app but the same thing happened so I throw my phone off a building like a boomerang and it came back and hit me in the face I was knocked out but when I gained consciousness I was tied to a trump 2020 flag pole. Stand around me where Oompa Loompas and their ring leader Oompa Loompa Cheeto aka ourğŸŠpresidentğŸŠ. They said if I didnâ€™t vote trump 2020 the would execute me by throwing it back on me while playing beans over and over. But little did they know beans TikTok had my back and out of nowhere bush beans men took me away and I was safe. But I when I returned home my house was painted orange and there were trump flags everywhere. I deleted the app and things slowly started to disappear. But the EXTENSIVE therapy I need Is expensive so I would like to be reimbursed for my troubles.
